nodes.text: Inquiry on the sabotaging of the Anya Karu

An Inquiry was put into the sabotaging of the Imperial Imperial-class Star Destroyer Anya Karu, downed by Rebel operatives prior to 3 BBY. However, this Inquiry turned out to be just for show as the Galactic Empire soon demoted Captain Aron Harcourt, the commanding officer of the now downed warship, to a desk job on a distant outpost.
